I would say it would be useful for yourself, a group of friends/family hanging out having some beers, the beach, lake, pool, park. Not for a huge party.

title: Great product overall
comment: Very happy with this product. Definitely a good portable bluetooth speaker. It's loud, and quite good. Battery lasts quite long as I keep it in my bag for a couple days and it still has charge.Turning it on automatically connects to a bluetooth device, so that is very convenient.

title: Don't Update!
comment: Beware of this speaker!  I may change my mind after I return my new UE Boom 2 to Logitech and get my replacement speaker.When I first bought this beautiful speaker, I fell in love with it. It was amazing. It was so easy to use with my IOS and android devices.  CNET was so right to say that it was an awesome speaker.Then I updated it. This has been a known problem after updating.  The speaker would no longer work anymore. I could control the volume from my iOS device but there was no sound at all.I called Logitech and after troubleshooting this speaker, he said to send it back to them for a replacement.  They provide free UPS return shipping.I will update this review again after a get my replacement speaker.

title: This product is a great investment for a music lover
comment: I previously purchased a the Beats pill Bluetooth speaker. It was poorly designed producing mediocre sound.  I use the UE boom 2  as my go to travel speaker.  The mid range and bass are exceptional for a speaker of this size.  This product is a great investment for a music lover ,or a person such as me,who creates podcasts and voiceovers who  needs a solid travel speaker for work.

title: Best sound, great battery, loud...
comment: As soon as I unboxed this speaker, I decided to start playing some music. It had amazing sound, and really fills the room. It gets very loud, enough that I can use it while working out at the outside gym, and can still hear the music easily. Even after a week of workouts (about 10 hours) and some play time in the office, it still had some juice left. The app seemed to hiccup once in a blue moon, but was otherwise reliable.

title: Awesome speakers. Great buy.
comment: We bought these speakers on a whim and fell in love with them, they have an amazing sound and not overly bassy like Beats products in my opinion.I love that they're portable shockproof and water resistant. The battery life is awesome lasted through a whole party being moved around and played non stop.I don't necessarily use the device free control where you can tap the speaker to play, pause or skip song, but it works and is nice to have.Bluetooth connectivity is strong but when connecting two UE BOOM 2s sometimes it takes a few attempts but the app makes this process easier. Also I enjoy have an option for an auxiliary cord if Bluetooth isn't available.The packaging is really nice could be used as a carrying case on more rugged or long adventures although it may be too bulky for that.Included is a charger that feels well made and not flimsy or cheap, with a good cord length.

title: and the range and battery life are fantastic. Highly recommend this speaker
comment: I researched many bluetooth speakers before choosing one. Chose this for the waterproofing and sound quality, and it exceeds expectations. Bass is surprisingly clear, speaker gets plenty loud, and the range and battery life are fantastic. Highly recommend this speaker! I can't wait to get a second for the pairing feature.

title: the quality of the speaker is really nice, honestly
comment: I picked this up as a Father's Day present for my dad. The shipping was fast, the quality of the speaker is really nice, honestly. It took a little while for him to get used to it as the interface isn't super obvious at the beginning, as the buttons aren't clearly labeled. But after a brief internet search, he found out they have an app to support the speaker, giving a more thorough set of instructions and features, as well as some settings to tinker with the equalizer. The primary complaint with it is that the bass could certainly be stronger, but the sound on acoustics and vocals is pretty fantastic. Overall, he's quite happy with the product, so I am as well. It was packaged nicely in a nice carrying case.He's also looking forward to possibly ordering a second one to enable the stereo feature down the road.

title: Best Speaker I've Ordered
comment: I've ordered a few speakers (waterproof and not) and this is by far my favorite so far.  Powerful sound, easy to connect, and great sound.  We will be brining this to the beach regularly.  My only complaint is that there is no manual included in the box (or at least not in mine), so figuring out some of the advanced functions (battery life, skipping tracks, etc) is not super intuitive.  A small search on the internet fixed that, though, and the product is fantastic - so 5 stars!

title: UE BOOM 2 vs Competition
comment: At first i was reluctant because of the huge competition,JBL, Fugoo, Bose, Harmon, Philips etc., i started going to malls and listing to everything i could put my hands on but it was just too much choices: loudness vs quality, portability vs sound, lows vs mids vs highs, expensive vs cheap claiming to be great,  you name it. So i narrowed my search within the same price range / features and after lots of testing i ended up comparing Fugoo and UE BOOM 2, Fugoo is available in the local market so i could test how it sounds in person and believe me its a nice product the only issue i had with it is the weird shape and the not so clear lows, total loudness is great but place a flip 2 (not flip 3) next to it and it will demolish it (loudness and not quality). since UE Boom 2 is not available locally i had to depend on the reviews and believe me i read and saw lots mixed ones, a point that my wife looked at me one day and told me you did research on this thing more than you did on our honeymoon trip. Both are heavy on weather / shock proofing IPX7 and voice call feature, the deciding factor at the end was the looks (UE BOOM 2 brain-freeze edition won hands down) and battery life (Fugoo has the longest duration of them all claiming 40 hours its nice yes but a car charger / power bank and all the USBs and electrical sockets in the world can help solving this). despite me never knowing how it really sounds (you-tube is never accurate) eventually i chose to take the plunge on the UE BOOM 2 depending only on the reviews (its weird how humans have this infinite lust for mystery). Amazon did great with the delivery as usual and voila packaging check, looks check, built quality check, application installed and speaker updated check, its the moment of truth the speaker has only sole job to do and yessss it performs in the sound department, just what i wanted and visualized: lows, mids,  highs,  hip hop, house,  techno, classic you name it,  this tiny thing is awesome and with this price drop i would highly recommend it.

title: Easy to set up
comment: Easy to set up, runs for many hours on a charge. Fast portable easy way to share your phone/laptop music with your friends. I almost minus'd one star because it lacks a bit of low end, but given its tiny size it's amazing what it does put out. No regrets.  Throw it in your backpack waterbottle holder and make people remember why earbuds were invented.

title: No APP for Windows Devices
comment: There is no APP for windows devices for this product. If you have a windows phone be aware that you will not have access to the application nor is any development planned. Pretty lame. This will be my last Logitech purchase...there are just too many alternatives for everything they produce.

title: Holy crap
comment: This is the speaker to get. It blows away other brands. It sounds wonderful. It's battery life and range are great. No, the bass won't shatter windows, but it's small, so you have to expect that. I have submerged mine in water to see if it would still work, and it does! If you're in the market this is the speaker to buy.

title: Great as a speakerphone as well as a music player
comment: I have been in need of a replacement speakerphone for my jambox which has gone end of support and quite frankly has not been a great business class speakerphone.  I splurged on the boom 2 and love it.  Loud enough speaker and sensitive enough mic for use in my office as well as a large conference room

title: Nice sound, but I have constant problems with the ...
comment: Nice sound, but I have constant problems with the wireless connection between the speaker and my smart phone. When I use iHeart Radio, the speaker loses the connection after each song ends. It's a pain having to re-connect for each song. This has left me very frustrated and I would return the product, but I have too much going on right now...

title: Great speaker to bring to the beach or camping
comment: Great speaker to bring to the beach or camping.  Reasonably loud for its size. Great battery life compared to many options out there, but if you use maximum volume you will not get nearly as much as advertised.  Using it at less than maximum i have used it for over 7hrs without charging, but it died around the 6 hr mark for me when on full blast the entire time.  You can double up with the original Boom, but it won't output in stereo, (one speaker acting as left, and one as right), with that model.  Bluetooth sync is easy, and all the controls are easy to use and learn.

title: Love it- sounds great!
comment: Love this speaker!  The sound carries really well and it's very simple to use. I use it to teach yoga classes and carry it around to various places. It has held up very well and doesn't show scratches. Great product if you need a speaker that will hold up to being bumped around. I used a Bose sound link before this and I prefer the UE Boom!

title: Not your grandma's boombox........
comment: Purchased this for my 12 year old granddaughter's birthday. It sounds awesome. She takes it everywhere. Now her Dad wants the larger one. He previously purchased a Bose system and the UE Boom 2 beats it by a mile. She can drowned him out. If he's good, maybe Santa will bring him one for Christmas.....

title: Buy this one!
comment: Great sound quality, excellent bass for a small unit.  Amazing volume - and no distortion even when playing it loud!  Battery lasts FOREVER on a charge.  We've used it off and on on nice days this Spring and it's been over 2 weeks without recharging so far!  Stop looking at other portable bluetooth speakers and buy this one!

title: Great Sound from a great speaker!
comment: This speaker is awesome.  Great sound and easy to use.  Waterproof is great as it makes it easy to take to parties, picnics, etc.  You can't beat this speaker.Volume buttons are huge and super easy to operate.  It has good connectivity range with my bluetooth devices so you can move around with your phone without it cutting out.Good base from this little speaker.Charge lasts for hours, so you can listen to music until your heart is content.Tap the top of the speaker to skip songs which is a convenient feature....as long as your annoying friends don't figure out how to use it and start skipping good songs on you!

title: Best musical purchase I've ever made
comment: Absolutely the best music purchase I've ever made!! My son was given one as a graduation gift from high school and took it with him to college, so we missed it at the house. I bought one because I missed it so much!! I can hear it when I do yard work and all through the house during other chores. My son would use it during his showers which would last way too long!! The quality is great and the battery life is incredible too. On a medium volume, which is still relatively loud, it lasts easily up to 8 hours.

title: WORST SUPPORT EVER! DON'T BUY IT!
comment: WORST SUPPORT EVER! DON'T BUY IT!Bought the BOOM 2 last month and never worked so well . I had trouble connecting the device the first time with my iPhone 6 and my MacBook Pro Retina ( Yosemite ) . After I downloaded the App EU got worse.The device controls didn't respond, I could control only by my iPhone. No device button seemed to work at all. So I went in Bluetooth option from my cell phone and clicked on " forget this device ", and RESET the BOOM 2 by pressing the volume button - and the power button simultaneously for 10 seconds and after that the device never turn on again . I wrote about 4 emails to UE Logitech Support on their webpage, but never got any response . UE Logitech is not interested in support for anyone. It is NOT a serious company . I DO NOT RECOMMEND TO ANYONE. I want my money back.

title: Great sound, easy to use, what's not to love?!
comment: This is one of my best recent purchases! Bought it to take on trips and took it to Brazil for carnaval on the beach in southern Bahia. The sound works great out in the open, even on a windy beach, and I didn't have to worry about ocean spray and sand. Now back home I have it in my shower so I can listen to some tunes while cleaning up.It is a bit pricey, but for the quality delivered I thing it's totally worth it.Highly recommended!!
